lcn.p: Of course, there are many other pitfalls as well - and you must always bear in mind that while much diversity exists within the Jedi path, not everyone who calls zimself a Jedi is in fact a Jedi. Rather, there are a number of ways in which one may be deluded into thinking that zie is a Jedi while in reality, zie is on a path that strays quite significantly from that of the Jedi.
While it may be impossible, or at last impractical, to describe every form of faux Jedi that may exist, let us at least discuss some of the most noteworthy forms.
